course_name: Foundations of Speech and Language Processing
course_description:
Fundamentals of natural language processing, automatic speech recognition and speech synthesis; lab projects concentrating on building systems to process written and/or spoken language.
Prereq: 3521 or 5521, and 5522, Stat 3460, or 3470. Not open to students with credit for 733.
course_prerequisites: Prereq: 3521 or 5521, and 5522, Stat 3460, or 3470. Not open to students with credit for 733.
